column2: The population of [Root.GetName] consists mainly of non-human scum. As human I can't bear to see those creatures taking land and jobs from honest hard working humans. A little housecleaning is in order.
The population of [Root.GetName] consists mainly of non-human scum. Although they are somewhat protected by laws, making me unable to kill them outright, I can still make them miserable.
Seems like my non-human policies have worked very well, humans now make the most of peasantry while those scums died from starvation, diseases and best part was that they suffered.
The population of [Root.GetName] consists mainly of non-human scum. As  a devote follower of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] I can't bear to see those abominations plagueing this land any longer.
